title: Pixel 3 XL stuck at Google logo for more than an hour!
content:
Worse Android update. There is no such update that takes that long for previous major update of Android.
Any solution or explanation from Android team ?

https://photos.app.goo.gl/jf3iFY2Abrbi1iez9

Update: after waiting for 140 minutes (2 hours and 40 minutes), I am giving out, and rebooted several times to get back to Android Pie.
This is the WORST update I ever encountered, after owning Nexus 4, Nexus 6P, Pixel 2 XL and Pixel 3 XL.
Waiting for Google Android team explanation and fix this shit soon.
